description: This wine glasses really allows you to go anywhere and enjoy the world.

INEWEX stemless wine glasses are dishwasher safe.  Designed for enjoyment of wine, this wine glass is perfect for any cold/hot drink. Each box comes with a set of 4 shatterproof glasses that are ideal for indoor and outdoor - picnics, outdoor parties or seaside. Before first use and after each use, wash the glasses by hand with warm soapy water. Rinse and dry thoroughly. If using a dishwasher, place glasses on

for cleaning. The capacity of each cup is 16 oz, it means that the cup is filled to the brim. Many dishwasher detergents leave small scratches in glass and plastic depending on the hardness of the water and the type of detergent used. So that to keep them looking sparkly, shatterproof glasses would prefer a hand wash every once in a while! Do not use abrasive wipes, sponges, pads or brushes. Do not use soaps/detergents containing abrasive particles. Otherwise, the cups will get scratched and cloudy.
